definition: to sail against the current/(fig.) to go against the flow
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 于我，在爱情的河流里，我经常觉得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: Because when you know you're treading uncharted waters, you're following the compass of your heart.
sentences.chinese: 因为你知道你在逆流而上，你在追随你内心的指南针。

sentences.english: The boat is sailing up the Seine.
sentences.chinese: 小船在塞纳河中逆流而上。

sentences.english: Don't stop, so the beast's upstream instead.
sentences.chinese: 转来转去不停止，于是石兽反而逆流而上了。
顺雅鲁藏布江逆流而上，是日喀则。

sentences.english: Was it an early Portuguese explorer who traveled up the Mangoky River?
sentences.chinese: 是早期沿着曼戈基河逆流而上的葡萄牙探险家吗？

sentences.english: Bulls have been found thousands of miles upstream in both the Mississippi and Amazon Rivers.
sentences.chinese: 牛鲨能逆流而上数千英里进入密西西比和亚马逊河。

sentences.english: We in the South China Steel net on a counter-current to see the spirit and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 我们在华南钢网身上看到了一种逆流而上的精神动力。

definition: against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
against the current/upstream
with the current
torrent/torrential current/whitewater
to brave the wind and the billows (idiom); to have high ambitions
to drift with the waves and go with the flow (idiom); to follow the crowd blindly
lit. navigating a boat against the current (idiom)/fig. in a tough environment (one needs to work hard)
rapid (flow of water)
to set sail/to brave the waves
river water
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
Yangtze and Yellow rivers
river
to cross (a body of water)
torrent
see 一往無前|一往无前[yi1 wang3 wu2 qian2]
opposite bank (of a body of water)
